changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.agency_attribute_authorization AS SELECT base_table.id , res.name AS grouping_agency, cls.name AS classification, b.name AS classifier, att.name AS authorized_attribute, base_table.sequence_number, base_table.text_value, base_table.integer_value, base_table.numeric_value, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM agency_attribute_authorization base_table LEFT JOIN agency_network_authorization na ON base_table.network_authorization = na.id LEFT JOIN agency res ON base_table.grouping_agency = res.id LEFT JOIN relationship cls ON na.classification = cls.id LEFT JOIN agency b ON na.classifier = b.id LEFT JOIN attribute att ON base_table.authorized_attribute = att.id LEFT JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id WHERE base_table.authorized_attribute IS NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE readable.agency_attribute_authorization OWNER TO core; GRANT ALL ON TABLE readable.agency_attribute_authorization TO core; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.agency_attribute_authorization TO core_read_write; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.agency_attribute_authorization TO core_read_only;
